name: Fearless Aura
descriptionText: Your aura of courage becomes more potent, as your steadfast resolve is also manifested by your allies.
benefitText: Your aura of courage expands to a 20-foot-radius emanation. Allies within the aura are immune to fear effects.
normalText: The aura of courage affects each ally within 10 feet, and grants a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects.
